views.markdown:
Version 1.1.7 - Added the option to Exit the Folder Easily Just Taping Inside it. Implemented My Tweak TapFolderExit Available on My Repository. (Thanks Tip by sinfool). Version 1.1.6
- Tested and Working Fine also on iOS 11 (Download Enabled).
Version 1.1.5
- Added the option to Custom Change All the Inside Folders Titles Text at Once.
- Added the Label to Check Other Tweaks by Me on BigBoss Repo.
- Added My Twitter, My Repo and Donations Images Labels.
- Now you can Add my Repo on Cydia and Donate me (thanks) with the New Labels in Preferences Panel.
- Fixes in the Preferences Labels Panel.
- Changes in Settings Panel Labels.
- Improvements.
Version 0.0.1-4
- Added the option to make Nested Folders in Folders (incorporation of NestedFolders on my Personal Repository).

- iOS 10 fully working.
Version 0.0.1-3
- Completely redesigned and redefined the Settings Panel of the Tweak.
Version 0.0.1-2
- Code Cleanup.
- I am almost certain it is working on iOS 8.3, 8.4 since ever, (i finally had a chance to test it on iPhone 5S iOS 8.3).
